title: lab()
description: The `lab()` CSS function specifies a color using the CIELAB color space, which describes colors based on lightness and two color components.
content: The color function that defines colors using the CIELAB color space, which separates lightness from two color components: 'a' (from green to red) and 'b' (from blue to yellow). It provides a more perceptually uniform way of defining colors, making it easier to achieve consistent color contrasts.
